00035 void sopt_sara_initop(sopt_sara_param *param, int nx1, int nx2, int nb_levels, 
00036                       sopt_wavelet_type *dict_types){
00037     
00038   int i;
00039 
00040   //Allocate memory for the wavelet parameter list
00041   param->wav_params = malloc(param->ndict * sizeof(sopt_wavelet_param));
00042   SOPT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(param->wav_params);
00043 
00044   for (i = 0; i < param->ndict; i++){
00045     param->wav_params[i].nx1 = nx1;
00046     param->wav_params[i].nx2 = nx2;
00047     param->wav_params[i].nb_levels = nb_levels;
00048     param->wav_params[i].type = dict_types[i];
00049     //Initialize wavelet parameters
00050     sopt_wavelet_initwav(&param->wav_params[i]);
00051   }
00052 
00053 }

00062 void sopt_sara_free(sopt_sara_param *param) {
00063 
00064   int i;
00065 
00066   if (param->wav_params != NULL){
00067                 
00068     for (i = 0; i < param->ndict; i++){
00069       if (param->wav_params[i].h != NULL) free(param->wav_params[i].h);
00070     }
00071 
00072     free(param->wav_params);
00073   }
00074 
00075 }

00087 void sopt_sara_analysisop(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00088 
00089   int i,d;
00090   int nx;
00091   double sc;
00092   sopt_sara_param *param;
00093   complex double *tempc;
00094   double *tempr;
00095   complex double *xinc;
00096   double *xinr;
00097   complex double *xoutc;
00098   double *xoutr;
00099 
00100 
00101   //cast input pointer for the data
00102   param = (sopt_sara_param*)data[0];
00103   if (param->real == 1){
00104     xinr = (double*)in;
00105     xoutr = (double*)out;
00106   }
00107   else {
00108     xinc = (complex double*)in;
00109     xoutc = (complex double*)out;
00110   }
00111 
00112   // Image dimension.
00113   nx = param->wav_params[0].nx1*param->wav_params[0].nx2;
00114 
00115   // Scale for the operator.
00116   sc = 1.0/sqrt((double)param->ndict);
00117 
00118   // Main loop.
00119   #pragma omp parallel default(none) \
00120   shared(i, nx, param, xoutr, xoutc, xinr, xinc) \
00121   private(d, tempr, tempc)
00122   {
00123     #pragma omp for
00124     for (i = 0; i < param->ndict; i++){
00125                 
00126       d = i*nx;
00127       if (param->real == 1){
00128                tempr = xoutr + d;
00129                sopt_wavelet_gdfwtr(tempr, xinr, param->wav_params[i]);
00130       }
00131       else {
00132                tempc = xoutc + d;
00133                sopt_wavelet_gdfwtc(tempc, xinc, param->wav_params[i]);
00134       }
00135     }
00136   }
00137 
00138   // Scaling the result.
00139   if (param->real == 1){
00140     cblas_dscal(param->ndict*nx, sc, xoutr,1);
00141   }
00142   else {
00143     cblas_zdscal(param->ndict*nx, sc, (void*)xoutc,1);
00144   }
00145     
00146 }

00159 void sopt_sara_synthesisop(void *out, void *in, void **data){
00160 
00161   int i,d;
00162   int nx;
00163   double sc;
00164   complex double alpha;
00165   sopt_sara_param *param;
00166   complex double *tempc;
00167   double *tempr;
00168   complex double *xinc;
00169   double *xinr;
00170   complex double *xoutc;
00171   double *xoutr;
00172 
00173   // Cast input pointer for the data.
00174   param = (sopt_sara_param*)data[0];
00175   if (param->real == 1){
00176     xinr = (double*)in;
00177     xoutr = (double*)out;
00178   }
00179   else {
00180     xinc = (complex double*)in;
00181     xoutc = (complex double*)out;
00182   }
00183 
00184   // Signal dimension.
00185   nx = param->wav_params[0].nx1*param->wav_params[0].nx2;
00186 
00187   // Scale for the operator.
00188   sc = 1.0/sqrt((double)param->ndict);
00189     
00190   // Initialize solution to zero.
00191   if (param->real == 1){
00192     for (d = 0; d < nx; d++)
00193       *(xoutr + d) = 0.0;
00194   }
00195   else {
00196     alpha = 0.0 + I*0.0;
00197     for (d = 0; d < nx; d++)
00198       *(xoutc + d) = alpha;
00199   }
00200 
00201   // Main loop.
00202   #pragma omp parallel default(none) \
00203   shared(i, nx, param, xoutr, xoutc, xinr, xinc) \
00204   private(d, tempr, tempc)
00205   {
00206     #pragma omp for
00207     for (i = 0; i < param->ndict; i++){
00208                 
00209       d = i*nx;
00210       if (param->real == 1){            
00211                tempr = xinr + d;
00212                sopt_wavelet_gdiwtr(tempr, tempr, param->wav_params[i]); 
00213       }
00214       else {                    
00215                tempc = xinc + d;
00216                sopt_wavelet_gdiwtc(tempc, tempc, param->wav_params[i]);
00217       }
00218 
00219     }
00220   }
00221 
00222   // Reduce data by summing over contribution from each dictionary
00223   // and scaling it.
00224   // (This could be openmp reduced in Fortran but not supported in C.)
00225   alpha = sc + I*0.0;
00226   for (i = 0; i < param->ndict; i++){
00227     d = i*nx;   
00228     if (param->real == 1) {
00229       tempr = xinr + d;
00230       cblas_daxpy(nx, sc, tempr, 1, xoutr, 1);
00231     }
00232     else {
00233       tempc = xinc + d;
00234       cblas_zaxpy(nx, (void*)&alpha, (void*)tempc, 1, (void*)xoutc, 1);
00235     }
00236   }
00237 
00238 }
